disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Transcendent.

blurb.value: Spells gain extra effects at max rank. Dark Sphere: Sphere's lifetime is increased to 8 seconds. Force of Will: Deals 20% bonus true damage. Scatter the Weak: Spell width increased by 50%. Unleashed Power: Range increased by 75.

description.value: Innate: Each of Syndra's abilities gain an additional effect at maximum rank.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The earliest possible champion level required for Transcendent to take effect is level 9, as this is the lowest level at which a basic ability can reach rank 5. Syndra's abilities gain additional visual effects when they reach rank 5. Her spells will also gain a red colored tint outlining the VFX. Dark Sphere will cause fractures to appear in the earth when it is used. Scatter the Weak gains a wider cone.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Dark Sphere.

effect radius.value: 180

blurb.value: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers.

description.value: Active: After 0.6 seconds, Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere at the target location, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit, which then remains for 6 seconds.

description2.value: Transcendent Bonus: Dark Sphere deals 25% bonus damage against champions.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Dark Sphere can be conjured inside terrain, but cannot be thrown there with Force of Will.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Force of Will.

target range.value: 925 / 950

effect radius.value: 225

blurb.value: Syndra picks up and throws a Dark Sphere or enemy minion dealing magic damage and slowing the Movement Speed of enemies.

description.value: Active: Syndra telekinetically grabs the nearest Dark Sphere, enemy minion or non-epic monster within 400 range from the target location for 5 seconds, or if not found it grabs the nearest Dark Sphere. If a Dark Sphere is grabbed, its duration is refreshed; if a minion or monster is grabbed, it is put in stasis. Force of Will can be recast at no delay.

description2.value: Recast: Syndra throws the grabbed target towards the target area, granting sight of the projectile's surroundings as they fall. Enemies struck, including the grabbed target, take magic damage and are slowed for 1.5 seconds.

description3.value: Transcendent Bonus: Force of Will deals Â 20% bonus true damage.

leveling3.value: Bonus True Damage:Â»46 (+Â 14% AP)Â«Total Mixed Damage:276 (+Â 84% AP)

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The initial cast does not count as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as Spellblade, charging Spellbinder, and stacking Force Pulse. Detonating the ability manually does. Force of Will does not destroy in-flight projectiles for the minion or monster grabbed. Syndra can grab pets, such as Shaco's Jack in the Box. Casting Teleport or Recall will cause Syndra to cancel Force of Will autonomously and drop anything she is holding. Grabbing prioritizes Dark Spheres. Once upgraded to maximum rank Force of Will gains a total damage increase of (20 + enemy's MRÂ Ã·Â 5)%. Enemy pets that passively have an effect on their surroundings will continue to affect the area around them while they are being held. For example, Annie's Tibbers will continue to inflict burn damage on surrounding units while being held. Grabbing a Dark Sphere will cause the duration on it to refresh, but only on the first cast, not when it is thrown. Force of Will has additional effects when targeting the Blue Sentinel and Red Brambleback. Throwing the former will refund 10 mana to Syndra upon cast and will reduce the Â cooldown of Force of Will by 1 second, while throwing the latter will apply the Crest of Cinders burn to any affected units in the area of effect.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Scatter the Weak.

target range.value: 700 / 800

angle.value: 40Â° / 60Â°

blurb.value: Syndra knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing magic damage. Enemies hit by Dark Spheres become stunned.

description.value: Active: Syndra knocks back all enemies in a cone in the target direction for 400 units and up to 800 units away from her based on proximity, dealing magic damage.

description2.value: Dark Spheres can also be knocked back for 1000 units and up to 1300 units away from Syndra based on proximity, knocking back all enemies they collide with for 100 units and stunning and revealing them for 1.5 seconds, and dealing Scatter the Weak's damage if they were not affected by the initial cast.

description3.value: Transcendent Bonus: Scatter the Weak's area of effect is 50% wider.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Scatter the Weak is blocked by the portion of Wind Wall it collides with. Spheres thrown will stop upon colliding with the wall. Enemies and spheres will be knocked into the direction directly away from Syndra, and the knock back has no dispersion. Conjuring a Dark Sphere at max range or close to or inside the edge of Scatter the Weak's conic-area of effect will knock back the sphere immediately once it has formed. This considers the sphere's center.* Scatter the Weak will knock back Spheres even farther if they are inside terrain, up until they reach open space. If the terrain they're inside in cannot be surpassed, the Spheres will be knocked in the opposite direction. Scatter the Weak will cast from wherever Syndra is at the end of the cast time. Once Scatter the Weak has been learned, an arrow directly in front of every Dark Sphere will appear to signify the direction the sphere will be knocked towards, each one corresponding to Syndra's position. This is only visible to Syndra.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Unleashed Power.

target range.value: 675 / 750

blurb.value: Syndra bombards an enemy Champion with all of her Dark Spheres.

description.value: Active: Syndra grabs up to 4 nearby Dark Spheres and the three orbiting around her and hurls them at the target enemy champion, dealing magic damage per sphere.

leveling.value: Magic Damage per Sphere:90 / 115 / 140 / 165 / 190 (+Â 20% AP)Minimum Damage:Â»270 / 345 / 420 / 495 / 570 (+Â 60% AP)Â«Maximum Damage:630 / 805 / 980 / 1155 / 1330 (+Â 140% AP)

description2.value: The Dark Spheres will then remain on the ground for 6 seconds.

description3.value: Transcendent Bonus: Unleashed Power's cast range is increased.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Unleashed Power has a brief cast time before it activates, but Syndra does not have to remain in place while the spheres apply their damage. She can walk away as soon as the casting has completed, as the spheres only begin dealing their damage after the casting time. Each one of the sphere hits is considered a single target spell, triggering Muramana's shock each time. Casting Unleashed Power on a target that becomes untargetable while the spheres are in flight will cause them to deal no damage. Spheres already in flight will still travel if Syndra's target dies, but any remaining sphere will not. However, their duration will still get reset. A Dark Sphere summoned very shortly before Unleashed Power will be used as one of the spheres that get thrown. Depending on how many spheres are on the map and how far away the enemy is upon casting Unleashed Power it is possible that Syndra would conjure the sphere behind her as if she was going to throw it, but she won't. Spell shield will only block the damage of a single sphere.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.
